title: Where can I find clipart like this?
content:
I'm looking for swirly patterns like those found in the backround of this site:

[http://www.yankclothing.com/home.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023204532/http:/www.yankclothing.com/home.php "http://www.yankclothing.com/home.php")

Anyone know where I can find stuff like this?

Nathan
author: sativo

comments.content: There are several similar fleurons available at [Lanston Type Co.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023204532/http:/www.p22.com/lanston/products/Granjon.html) at P22 to start.

The ornaments found in the Fountain typefaces [Dekoria](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023204532/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=FOT0000070) and [Delicato](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023204532/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=FOT0000073) have some tasty bits.
[http://youworkforthem.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023204532/http:/youworkforthem.com/ "http://youworkforthem.com") has some really nice vector stock art.

Excellent resource, Forrest! I hadn't seen that site before. Nice stuff.

Put together one (or more) of their [Flourishes](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023204532/http:/youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=E0105) packages along with [Leaves 01](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023204532/http:/youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=E0112), and you've pretty much got the effect.

These are great. Anyone know of any others.

I'm also looking for anything that comes close to this type of russian pattern:

[http://www.khokhloma.net/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023204532/http:/www.khokhloma.net/ "http://www.khokhloma.net/")
